name: Violet Gold
description:
Join Ollia and Nero, two dastardly rogues, on their vacation to Mellunam Island! ...that said, the loving couple's vacation turned out to be a bust. Disgruntled, they turn to conquer Mellunam to establish a tourism spot worthy of them.

That requires some work and some demon-summoning and some kicking, but that's business as usual for two villains.

  • Play as a beautiful mad scientist and her dark mage husband.
  • Explore Mellunam Island and conquer its major towns.
  • Defeat the island guardians standing in your way.

You crawl through the dungeon that the island guardians inhabit, solving the puzzles, evading the obsticles and fighting adversaries in a traditional turn-based RPG style. Provision and new equipment can be found in your camp or the towns that you capture.

Level the characters up in battle to unlock more of their dark powers and crush the bosses you encounter. You can upgrade them up to Level 10, gaining the most devastating magics and skills.

A short and sweet adventure for you enjoyment.
